ygData.subject: SV: [archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.
ygData.msgSnippet: JDBC libraries can be placed in the tomcat lib folder. So the contextloader is most likely not isolated enough for the webapp to run its own version of the

JDBC libraries can be placed in the tomcat lib folder. So the contextloader=
 is most likely not isolated enough for the webapp to run its own version o=
f the libraries. Bad servlet container.

-Nicholas

lelse-----

lementation as far
> as I remember. So running inside a tomcat you might ha=
ve conflicting
